channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DB2 for Linux- UNIX and Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DB2 for Linux- UNIX and Windows

item.title: CVE-2020-4135|2024-09-16T18:28:29.112Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux-%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow an unauthenticated user to send specially crafted packets to cause a denial of service from excessive memory usage.

item.title: CVE-2020-4386|2024-09-16T18:14:21.586Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux-%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information using a race condition of a symbolic link. IBM X-Force ID: 179268.

item.title: CVE-2020-4161|2024-09-16T16:57:54.511Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux-%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 11.5 could allow an authenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to incorrect handling of certain commands. IBM X-Force ID: 174341.

item.title: CVE-2020-4204|2024-09-16T17:38:12.442Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux-%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 174960.

item.title: CVE-2020-4200|2024-09-16T18:54:03.631Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux-%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow an authenticated attacker to send specially crafted commands to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 174914.
